test-set.name: xp-striding-climbing-motionlessC
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Climbing, RS: Motionless Climbing axis attribute, namespace on self or climbing axis with U{element}} is climbing and motionless

test-case.name: xp-striding-climbing-motionlessC001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: climbing, RS: motionless Base expression: self::foo Separators: / With axes: attribute, namespace With node types: attribute, namespace Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
Changed node-type for namespace-node() tests w/o axis specifier from error to namespace, see bug#26788 (only applies to relevant tests)

test-case.name: xp-striding-climbing-motionlessC002

Changed node-type for namespace-node() tests w/o axis specifier from error to namespace, see bug#26788 (only applies to relevant tests)
